title: refactor(quic): consolidate duplicate patterns across module
body:
## Summary

Consolidate 3 major duplication patterns identified in the QUIC module analysis:

1. **Varint encoding** - 36 duplicate blocks across 7 Frame-*.c files
2. **Flow control** - 6 duplicate function pairs in SocketQUICFlow.c
3. **Result strings** - 12 files with identical lookup pattern

## Changes

### Phase 1: Varint Encoding Helper
- Add `encode_varint_field()` static inline helper
- Refactor 7 files to use the helper instead of repeated 5-line blocks

### Phase 2: Flow Control Helpers
- Add 4 internal helpers (`flow_window`, `flow_can_consume`, `flow_consume`, `flow_update_max`)
- Refactor 12 public functions to use helpers

### Phase 3: Result String Macro
- Add `DEFINE_RESULT_STRING_FUNC` macro to SocketQUICConstants.h
- Refactor 12 files with result_strings pattern

## Expected Impact

| Phase | Files Modified | Lines Saved |
|-------|---------------|-------------|
| 1 | 7 Frame-*.c | ~160 |
| 2 | 1 SocketQUICFlow.c | ~55 |
| 3 | 13 files | ~74 |
| **Total** | **21 files** | **~289** |

## Test Plan
- [ ] Build succeeds with sanitizers
- [ ] All existing tests pass
- [ ] No memory leaks (ASan)
- [ ] No undefined behavior (UBSan)
